backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Contains a feature evidence report listing a logoâ€‘replacement feature and associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted text mapping frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying them across the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root container, favicon, and app bootstrap script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper configuring routing, React Query, authentication gating, and global toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Auth gate that shows a login screen using Internet Identity if the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: Layout shell providing header with user-provided logo, navigation, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Navigation bar rendering a single Dashboard link with active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Dialog component with an extensive form for adding a new resident and validating form inputs.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Dialog for editing resident information with validation and dynamic physician fields.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Displays an individual resident card with profile info, actions to view, toggle status, and delete, including a confirmation dialog.
Renders the header for the resident dashboard with title text and a button to add a new resident.
Provides dropdown controls for filtering residents by room and sorting by various fields.
Displays a grid of ResidentCard components or a placeholder message when no residents match filters.
Shows KPI cards summarizing total, active, and discharged residents.
Renders tabs to filter residents by status: All, Active, or Discharged.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Displays a placeholder card listing missing reference materials with links and categorized missing items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend-related React Query hooks; contains no active logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles plus light/dark themes, custom colors, and print-specific styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page that manages resident list state, filtering, sorting, KPIs, and renders grid and add-resident dialog.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication data and a function returning medications by resident ID.
Builds detailed mock resident profile data derived from mockResidents and computed DOB.
Mock resident list with IDs, demographics, rooms, and counts for physicians and medications.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Utility functions for filtering, sorting, KPI calculations, and extracting unique rooms for residents.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Resident profile page that loads detailed mock data, medications, editing, printing, and tabbed sections.
Print-only resident profile report component showing resident info and medication tables.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: Reference checklist page outlining required UI screenshots, design assets, and app structure for replication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, fonts, and core plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, versioning, and a list of existing features describing backend, frontend, auth, UI components, and app pages.
